entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Abbotsford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Freezing Rain, -5.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Abbotsford Airport 11:28 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Freezing Rain
Temperature: -5.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -5.8°C
Wind: E 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Periods of ice pellets mixed with snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of ice pellets mixed with snow and risk of freezing rain. Ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
